text: Lichtenau is a market town in the district of Ansbach, Mittelfranken, Bavaria, Germany. A small village/town of roughly 3,780 population on the “Castle Road” theme route of Southern Germany. It is at 390 meters above sea level with an area of 41.39 km² (16 sq mi). ==References== ==Other websites== * Official Site of the town * Evangelical-Lutheran congregation of Lichtenau Category:Ansbach (district)
title: Lichtenau, Bavaria
